1605 #ifdef DEBUG
1606 static inline bool EPWM_isBaseValid(uint32_t base)
1607 {
1608  return(
1609  (base == EPWM1_BASE) ||
1610  (base == EPWM2_BASE) ||
1611  (base == EPWM3_BASE) ||
1612  (base == EPWM4_BASE) ||
1613  (base == EPWM5_BASE) ||
1614  (base == EPWM6_BASE) ||
1615  (base == EPWM7_BASE) ||
1616  (base == EPWM8_BASE) ||
1617  (base == EPWM9_BASE) ||
1618  (base == EPWM10_BASE) ||
1619  (base == EPWM11_BASE) ||
1620  (base == EPWM12_BASE)
1621  );
1622 }
1623 #endif

1625 //
1626 // Time Base Sub Module related APIs
1627 //
1628 //*****************************************************************************
1629 //
1638 //
1639 //*****************************************************************************
1640 static inline void
1641 EPWM_setTimeBaseCounter(uint32_t base, uint16_t count)
1642 {
1643  //
1644  // Check the arguments
1645  //
1646  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
1647 
1648  //
1649  // Write to TBCTR register
1650  //
1651  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTR) = count;
1652 }
1653 
1654 //*****************************************************************************
1655 //
1668 //
1669 //*****************************************************************************
1670 static inline void
1671 EPWM_setCountModeAfterSync(uint32_t base, EPWM_SyncCountMode mode)
1672 {
1673  //
1674  // Check the arguments
1675  //
1676  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
1677 
1678  if(mode == EPWM_COUNT_MODE_UP_AFTER_SYNC)
1679  {
1680  //
1681  // Set PHSDIR bit
1682  //
1683  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) |= EPWM_TBCTL_PHSDIR;
1684  }
1685  else
1686  {
1687  //
1688  // Clear PHSDIR bit
1689  //
1690  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) &= ~EPWM_TBCTL_PHSDIR;
1691  }
1692 }
1693 
1694 //*****************************************************************************
1695 //
1715 //
1716 //*****************************************************************************
1717 static inline void
1718 EPWM_setClockPrescaler(uint32_t base, EPWM_ClockDivider prescaler,
1719  EPWM_HSClockDivider highSpeedPrescaler)
1720 {
1721  //
1722  // Check the arguments
1723  //
1724  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
1725 
1726  //
1727  // Write to CLKDIV and HSPCLKDIV bit
1728  //
1729  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) =
1730  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) &
1731  ~(EPWM_TBCTL_CLKDIV_M | EPWM_TBCTL_HSPCLKDIV_M)) |
1732  (((uint16_t)prescaler << EPWM_TBCTL_CLKDIV_S) |
1733  ((uint16_t)highSpeedPrescaler << EPWM_TBCTL_HSPCLKDIV_S)));
1734 }
1735 
1736 //*****************************************************************************
1737 //
1747 //
1748 //*****************************************************************************
1749 static inline void
1750 EPWM_forceSyncPulse(uint32_t base)
1751 {
1752  //
1753  // Check the arguments
1754  //
1755  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
1756 
1757  //
1758  // Set SWFSYNC bit
1759  //
1760  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TBCTL) |= EPWM_TBCTL_SWFSYNC;
1761 }
1762 
1763 //*****************************************************************************
1764 //
1788 //
1789 //*****************************************************************************
1790 static inline void
1791 EPWM_setSyncInPulseSource(uint32_t base, EPWM_SyncInPulseSource source)
1792 {
1793  //
1794  // Check the arguments
1795  //
1796  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
1797 
1798  //
1799  // Set EPWM Sync-In Source Mode.
1800  //
1801  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SYNCINSEL) =
1802  (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_SYNCINSEL) & (~EPWM_SYNCINSEL_SEL_M)) |
1803  ((uint16_t)source & EPWM_SYNCINSEL_SEL_M);
1804 }
1805 
1806 //*****************************************************************************
1807 //
1838 //
1839 //*****************************************************************************
1840 static inline void
1841 EPWM_enableSyncOutPulseSource(uint32_t base, uint16_t source)
1842 {
1843  //
1844  // Check the arguments
1845  //
1846  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
1847  ASSERT(source <= EPWM_SYNC_OUT_SOURCE_M);
1848 
1849  //
1850  // Enable selected EPWM Sync-Out Sources.
1851  //

2477 //*****************************************************************************
2478 //
2505 //
2506 //*****************************************************************************
2507 static inline void
2508 EPWM_setCounterCompareShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
2509  EPWM_CounterCompareModule compModule,
2510  EPWM_CounterCompareLoadMode loadMode)
2511 {
2512  uint16_t syncModeOffset;
2513  uint16_t loadModeOffset;
2514  uint16_t shadowModeOffset;
2515  uint32_t registerOffset;
2516 
2517  //
2518  // Check the arguments
2519  //
2520  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2521 
2522  if((compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_A) ||
2523  (compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_C))
2524  {
2525  syncModeOffset = 10U;
2526  loadModeOffset = 0U;
2527  shadowModeOffset = 4U;
2528  }
2529  else
2530  {
2531  syncModeOffset = 12U;
2532  loadModeOffset = 2U;
2533  shadowModeOffset = 6U;
2534  }
2535 
2536  //
2537  // Get the register offset. EPWM_O_CMPCTL for A&B or
2538  // EPWM_O_CMPCTL2 for C&D
2539  //
2540  registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_CMPCTL + ((uint32_t)compModule & 0x1U);
2541 
2542  //
2543  // Set the appropriate sync and load mode bits and also enable shadow
2544  // load mode. Shadow to active load can also be frozen.
2545  //
2546  HWREGH(registerOffset) = ((HWREGH(registerOffset) &
2547  ~((0x3U << syncModeOffset) | // Clear sync mode
2548  (0x3U << loadModeOffset) | // Clear load mode
2549  (0x1U << shadowModeOffset))) | // shadow mode
2550  ((((uint16_t)loadMode >> 2U) << syncModeOffset) |
2551  (((uint16_t)loadMode & 0x3U) << loadModeOffset)));
2552 }
2553 
2554 //*****************************************************************************
2555 //
2570 //
2571 //*****************************************************************************
2572 static inline void
2573 EPWM_disableCounterCompareShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
2574  EPWM_CounterCompareModule compModule)
2575 {
2576  uint16_t shadowModeOffset;
2577  uint32_t registerOffset;
2578 
2579  //
2580  // Check the arguments
2581  //
2582  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2583 
2584  if((compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_A) ||
2585  (compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_C))
2586  {
2587  shadowModeOffset = 4U;
2588  }
2589  else
2590  {
2591  shadowModeOffset = 6U;
2592  }
2593 
2594  //
2595  // Get the register offset. EPWM_O_CMPCTL for A&B or
2596  // EPWM_O_CMPCTL2 for C&D
2597  //
2598  registerOffset = base + EPWM_O_CMPCTL + ((uint32_t)compModule & 0x1U);
2599 
2600  //
2601  // Disable shadow load mode.
2602  //
2603  HWREGH(registerOffset) = (HWREGH(registerOffset) |
2604  (0x1U << shadowModeOffset));
2605 }

2607 //*****************************************************************************
2608 //
2624 //
2625 //*****************************************************************************
2626 static inline void
2627 EPWM_setCounterCompareValue(uint32_t base, EPWM_CounterCompareModule compModule,
2628  uint16_t compCount)
2629 {
2630  uint32_t registerOffset;
2631 
2632  //
2633  // Check the arguments
2634  //
2635  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2636 
2637  //
2638  // Get the register offset for the Counter compare
2639  //
2640  registerOffset = EPWM_O_CMPA + (uint32_t)compModule;
2641 
2642  //
2643  // Write to the counter compare registers.
2644  //
2645  if((compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_A) ||
2646  (compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_B))
2647  {
2648  //
2649  // Write to COMPA or COMPB bits
2650  //
2651  HWREGH(base + registerOffset + 0x1U) = compCount;
2652  }
2653  else
2654  {

2656  // Write to COMPC or COMPD bits
2657  //
2658  HWREGH(base + registerOffset) = compCount;

2662 //*****************************************************************************
2663 //
2677 //
2678 //*****************************************************************************
2679 static inline uint16_t
2680 EPWM_getCounterCompareValue(uint32_t base, EPWM_CounterCompareModule compModule)
2681 {
2682  uint32_t registerOffset;
2683  uint16_t compCount;
2684 
2685  //
2686  // Check the arguments
2687  //
2688  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2689 
2690  //
2691  // Get the register offset for the Counter compare
2692  //
2693  registerOffset = EPWM_O_CMPA + (uint32_t)compModule;
2694 
2695  //
2696  // Read from the counter compare registers.
2697  //
2698  if((compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_A) ||
2699  (compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_B))
2700  {
2701  //
2702  // Read COMPA or COMPB bits
2703  //
2704  compCount = (uint16_t)((HWREG(base + registerOffset) &
2705  0xFFFF0000UL) >> 16U);
2706  }
2707  else
2708  {
2709  //
2710  // Read COMPC or COMPD bits
2711  //
2712  compCount = HWREGH(base + registerOffset);
2713  }
2714  return(compCount);
2715 }

2717 //*****************************************************************************
2718 //
2731 //
2732 //*****************************************************************************
2733 static inline bool
2734 EPWM_getCounterCompareShadowStatus(uint32_t base,
2735  EPWM_CounterCompareModule compModule)
2736 {
2737  //
2738  // Check the arguments
2739  //
2740  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2741 
2742  //
2743  // Check the validity of input.
2744  // COMPA and COMPB are valid input arguments.
2745  //
2746  ASSERT((compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_A) ||
2747  (compModule == EPWM_COUNTER_COMPARE_B));
2748 
2749  //
2750  // Read the value of SHDWAFULL or SHDWBFULL bit
2751  //
2752  return((((HWREG(base + EPWM_O_CMPCTL) >>
2753  ((((uint16_t)compModule >> 1U) & 0x1U) + 8U)) &
2754  0x1U) == 0x1U) ? true:false);

2757 //
2758 // Action Qualifier module related APIs
2759 //
2760 //*****************************************************************************
2761 //
2788 //
2789 //*****************************************************************************
2790 static inline void
2791 EPWM_setActionQualifierShadowLoadMode(uint32_t base,
2792  EPWM_ActionQualifierModule aqModule,
2793  EPWM_ActionQualifierLoadMode loadMode)
2794 {
2795  uint16_t syncModeOffset;
2796  uint16_t shadowModeOffset;
2797 
2798  //
2799  // Check the arguments
2800  //
2801  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2802 
2803  syncModeOffset = 8U + (uint16_t)aqModule;
2804  shadowModeOffset = 4U + (uint16_t)aqModule;
2805 
2806  //
2807  // Set the appropriate sync and load mode bits and also enable shadow
2808  // load mode. Shadow to active load can also be frozen.
2809  //
2810  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCTL) = ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_AQCTL) &
2811  (~((0x3U << (uint16_t)aqModule) |
2812  (0x3U << (uint16_t)syncModeOffset))) |
2813  (0x1U << shadowModeOffset)) |
2814  ((((uint16_t)loadMode >> 2U) <<
2815  syncModeOffset) | (((uint16_t)loadMode &
2816  0x3U) << (uint16_t)aqModule)));
2817 }

2850  // immediate mode only.
2851  //

2933 //*****************************************************************************
2934 //
2973 //
2974 //*****************************************************************************
2975 static inline void
2976 EPWM_setActionQualifierAction(uint32_t base,
2977  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputModule epwmOutput,
2978  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutput output,
2979  EPWM_ActionQualifierOutputEvent event)
2980 {
2981  uint32_t registerOffset;
2982  uint32_t registerTOffset;
2983 
2984  //
2985  // Check the arguments
2986  //
2987  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
2988 
2989  //
2990  // Get the register offset
2991  //
2992  registerOffset = EPWM_O_AQCTLA + (uint32_t)epwmOutput;
2993  registerTOffset = EPWM_O_AQCTLA2 + (uint32_t)epwmOutput;
2994 
2995  //
2996  // If the event occurs on T1 or T2 events
2997  //
2998  if(((uint16_t)event & 0x1U) == 1U)
2999  {
3000  //
3001  // Write to T1U,T1D,T2U or T2D of AQCTLA2 register
3002  //
3003  HWREGH(base + registerTOffset) =
3004  ((HWREGH(base + registerTOffset) & ~(3U << ((uint16_t)event - 1U))) |
3005  ((uint16_t)output << ((uint16_t)event - 1U)));
3006  }
3007  else
3008  {
3009  //
3010  // Write to ZRO,PRD,CAU,CAD,CBU or CBD bits of AQCTLA register
3011  //
3012  HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
3013  ((HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~(3U << (uint16_t)event)) |
3014  ((uint16_t)output << (uint16_t)event));
3015  }
3016 }

3389 //
3390 //*****************************************************************************
3391 //
3410 //
3411 //*****************************************************************************
3412 static inline void
3413 EPWM_setDeadBandOutputSwapMode(uint32_t base, EPWM_DeadBandOutput output,
3414  bool enableSwapMode)
3415 {
3416  uint16_t mask;
3417 
3418  //
3419  // Check the arguments
3420  //
3421  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3422 
3423  mask = (uint16_t)1U << ((uint16_t)output + EPWM_DBCTL_OUTSWAP_S);
3424 
3425  if(enableSwapMode)
3426  {
3427  //
3428  // Set the appropriate outswap bit to swap output
3429  //
3430  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) | mask);
3431  }
3432  else
3433  {
3434  //
3435  // Clear the appropriate outswap bit to disable output swap
3436  //
3437  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~mask);
3438  }
3439 }

3442 //
3461 //
3462 //*****************************************************************************
3463 static inline void
3464 EPWM_setDeadBandDelayMode(uint32_t base, EPWM_DeadBandDelayMode delayMode,
3465  bool enableDelayMode)
3466 {
3467  uint16_t mask;
3468 
3469  //
3470  // Check the arguments
3471  //
3472  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3473 
3474  mask = (uint16_t)1U << ((uint16_t)delayMode + EPWM_DBCTL_OUT_MODE_S);
3475 
3476  if(enableDelayMode)
3477  {
3478  //
3479  // Set the appropriate outmode bit to enable Dead Band delay
3480  //
3481  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) | mask);
3482  }
3483  else
3484  {
3485  //
3486  // Clear the appropriate outswap bit to disable output swap
3487  //
3488  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DBCTL) & ~ mask);
3489  }
3490 }

3515  EPWM_DeadBandDelayMode delayMode,
3516  EPWM_DeadBandPolarity polarity)
3517 {
3518  uint16_t shift;
3519

3521  // Check the arguments
3522  //
3523  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
3524 
3525  shift = (((uint16_t)delayMode ^ 0x1U) + EPWM_DBCTL_POLSEL_S);
3526

3529  //

3532  ((uint16_t)polarity << shift));

3592 {

4421  //
4422  // Set the Advanced Action for Trip Zone events
4423  //
4424  EALLOW;
4425  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTLDCA) =
4426  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTLDCA) & ~(0x7U << (uint16_t)tzAdvDCEvent)) |
4427  ((uint16_t)tzAdvDCAction << (uint16_t)tzAdvDCEvent));
4428 
4429  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_TZCTL2) |= EPWM_TZCTL2_ETZE;
4430  EDIS;
4431 }

4918 //*****************************************************************************
4919 //
4944 //
4945 //*****************************************************************************
4946 static inline void
4947 EPWM_setInterruptSource(uint32_t base, uint16_t interruptSource)
4948 {
4949  uint16_t intSource;
4950 
4951  //
4952  // Check the arguments
4953  //
4954  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
4955  ASSERT(((interruptSource > 0U) && (interruptSource < 9U)) ||
4956  (interruptSource == 10U) || (interruptSource == 12U) ||
4957  (interruptSource == 14U));
4958 
4959  if((interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_U_CMPC) ||
4960  (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_U_CMPD) ||
4961  (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_D_CMPC) ||
4962  (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_D_CMPD))
4963  {
4964  //
4965  // Shift the interrupt source by 1
4966  //
4967  intSource = interruptSource >> 1U;
4968 
4969  //
4970  // Enable events based on comp C or comp D
4971  //
4972  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_INTSELCMP;
4973  }
4974  else if((interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_U_CMPA) ||
4975  (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_U_CMPB) ||
4976  (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_D_CMPA) ||
4977  (interruptSource == EPWM_INT_TBCTR_D_CMPB))
4978  {
4979  intSource = interruptSource;
4980 
4981  //
4982  // Enable events based on comp A or comp B
4983  //
4984  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_INTSELCMP;
4985  }
4986  else
4987  {
4988  intSource = interruptSource;
4989  }
4990 
4991  //
4992  // Set the interrupt source
4993  //
4994  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) =
4995  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) & ~EPWM_ETSEL_INTSEL_M) | intSource);
4996 }

5013 EPWM_setInterruptEventCount(uint32_t base, uint16_t eventCount)

5025  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETINTPS) =

5322 //*****************************************************************************
5323 //
5351 //
5352 //*****************************************************************************
5353 static inline void
5354 EPWM_setADCTriggerSource(uint32_t base,
5355  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType,
5356  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionSource socSource)
5357 {
5358  uint16_t source;
5359 
5360  //
5361  // Check the arguments
5362  //
5363  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5364 
5365  if((socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPC) ||
5366  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPD) ||
5367  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPC) ||
5368  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPD))
5369  {
5370  source = (uint16_t)socSource >> 1U;
5371  }
5372  else
5373  {
5374  source = (uint16_t)socSource;
5375  }
5376 
5377  if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
5378  {
5379  //
5380  // Set the SOC source
5381  //
5382  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) =
5383  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) & ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCASEL_M) |
5384  (source << EPWM_ETSEL_SOCASEL_S));
5385 
5386  //
5387  // Enable the comparator selection
5388  //
5389  if((socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPA) ||
5390  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPB) ||
5391  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPA) ||
5392  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPB))
5393  {
5394  //
5395  // Enable events based on comp A or comp B
5396  //
5397  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCASELCMP;
5398  }
5399  else if((socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPC) ||
5400  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPD) ||
5401  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPC) ||
5402  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPD))
5403  {
5404  //
5405  // Enable events based on comp C or comp D
5406  //
5407  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_SOCASELCMP;
5408  }
5409  else
5410  {
5411  //
5412  // No action required for the other socSource options
5413  //
5414  }
5415  }
5416  else
5417  {
5418  //
5419  // Enable the comparator selection
5420  //
5421  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) =
5422  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) & ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBSEL_M) |
5423  (source << EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBSEL_S));
5424 
5425  //
5426  // Enable the comparator selection
5427  //
5428  if((socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPA) ||
5429  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPB) ||
5430  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPA) ||
5431  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPB))
5432  {
5433  //
5434  // Enable events based on comp A or comp B
5435  //
5436  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) &= ~EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBSELCMP;
5437  }
5438  else if((socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPC) ||
5439  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_U_CMPD) ||
5440  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPC) ||
5441  (socSource == EPWM_SOC_TBCTR_D_CMPD))
5442  {
5443  //
5444  // Enable events based on comp C or comp D
5445  //
5446  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSEL) |= EPWM_ETSEL_SOCBSELCMP;
5447  }
5448  else
5449  {
5450  //
5451  // No action required for the other socSource options
5452  //
5453  }
5454  }
5455 }

5457 //*****************************************************************************

5478 //
5479 //*****************************************************************************

5547 //*****************************************************************************
5548 //
5560 //
5561 //*****************************************************************************
5562 static inline void
5563 EPWM_clearADCTriggerFlag(uint32_t base,
5564  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
5565 {
5566  //
5567  // Check the arguments
5568  //
5569  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5570 
5571  //
5572  // Clear SOC A/B bit of ETCLR register
5573  //
5574  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCLR) |= 1U << ((uint16_t)adcSOCType + 2U);

5676 //*****************************************************************************
5677 //
5691 //
5692 //*****************************************************************************
5693 static inline void
5694 EPWM_setADCTriggerEventCountInitValue(uint32_t base,
5695  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType,
5696  uint16_t eventCount)
5697 {
5698  //
5699  // Check the arguments
5700  //
5701  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5702  ASSERT(eventCount < 16U);
5703 
5704  //
5705  // Set the ADC Trigger event count
5706  //
5707  if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
5708  {
5709  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) =
5710  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) & ~EPWM_ETCNTINIT_SOCAINIT_M) |
5711  (uint16_t)(eventCount << EPWM_ETCNTINIT_SOCAINIT_S));
5712  }
5713  else
5714  {
5715  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) =
5716  ((HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETCNTINIT) & ~EPWM_ETCNTINIT_SOCBINIT_M) |
5717  (eventCount << EPWM_ETCNTINIT_SOCBINIT_S));
5718  }
5719 }

5721 //*****************************************************************************
5722 //
5734 //
5735 //*****************************************************************************
5736 static inline uint16_t
5737 EPWM_getADCTriggerEventCount(uint32_t base,
5738  EPWM_ADCStartOfConversionType adcSOCType)
5739 {
5740  uint16_t eventCount;
5741 
5742  //
5743  // Check the arguments
5744  //
5745  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
5746 
5747  //
5748  // Return the SOC event count
5749  //
5750  if(adcSOCType == EPWM_SOC_A)
5751  {
5752  eventCount = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSOCPS) >>
5753  EPWM_ETSOCPS_SOCACNT2_S) & 0xFU;
5754  }
5755  else
5756  {
5757  eventCount = (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_ETSOCPS) >>
5758  EPWM_ETSOCPS_SOCBCNT2_S) & 0xFU;
5759  }
5760  return(eventCount);
5761 }

6753  //
6754  if(dcEvent == EPWM_DC_EVENT_1)
6755  {
6756  status = HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & EPWM_DCACTL_EVT1LAT;
6757  }
6758  else
6759  {
6760  status = HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & EPWM_DCACTL_EVT2LAT;
6761  }
6762  return(status != 0U);
6763 }

6987 //*****************************************************************************
6988 //
7006 //
7007 //*****************************************************************************
7008 static inline void
7009 EPWM_enableDigitalCompareTripCombinationInput(uint32_t base,
7010  uint16_t tripInput,
7011  EPWM_DigitalCompareType dcType)
7012 {
7013  uint32_t registerOffset;
7014 
7015  //
7016  // Check the arguments
7017  //
7018  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7019 
7020  //
7021  // Get the DCAHTRIPSEL, DCALTRIPSEL, DCBHTRIPSEL, DCBLTRIPSEL register
7022  // offset with respect to DCAHTRIPSEL
7023  //
7024  registerOffset = EPWM_O_DCAHTRIPSEL + (uint32_t)dcType;
7025 
7026  //
7027  // Set the DC trip input
7028  //
7029  EALLOW;
7030  HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
7031  (HWREGH(base + registerOffset) | tripInput);
7032 
7033  //
7034  // Enable the combination input
7035  //
7036  HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCTRIPSEL) =
7037  (HWREGH(base + EPWM_O_DCTRIPSEL) | (0xFU << ((uint16_t)dcType << 2U)));
7038  EDIS;
7039 }
7040 
7041 //*****************************************************************************
7042 //

7061 //*****************************************************************************
7062 static inline void
7063 EPWM_disableDigitalCompareTripCombinationInput(uint32_t base,
7064  uint16_t tripInput,
7065  EPWM_DigitalCompareType dcType)
7066 {
7067  uint32_t registerOffset;
7068 
7069  //
7070  // Check the arguments
7071  //
7072  ASSERT(EPWM_isBaseValid(base));
7073 
7074  //
7075  // Get the DCAHTRIPSEL, DCALTRIPSEL, DCBHTRIPSEL, DCBLTRIPSEL register
7076  // offset with respect to DCAHTRIPSEL
7077  //
7078  registerOffset = EPWM_O_DCAHTRIPSEL + (uint32_t)dcType;
7079 
7080  //
7081  // Set the DC trip input
7082  //
7083  EALLOW;
7084  HWREGH(base + registerOffset) =
7085  (HWREGH(base + registerOffset) & ~tripInput);
7086  EDIS;
7087 }

7238  ASSERT((startCount < 16U) && (stopCount < 16U));

7247  (startCount | (stopCount << 8U)));
7248  EDIS;
